ValidationRule.description: Check to see if the Account /Reseller /Distributor Name field (83 chars limit)
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Closed Won'), NOT($Permission.BYPASS_ALL_VALIDATIONS_ON_OPPTY), OR( LEN(Account.Name) > 83, LEN(Distributor__r.Name) > 83, LEN(Reseller__r.Name) > 83 ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Sorry - The Account /Reseller /Distributor Name can't exceed 83 characters.
